Title: Relates to authorizing the building inspector in the town of Pendleton, county of Niagara, to reside outside of such town
Summary: Authorizes the building inspector in the town of Pendleton, county of Niagara, to reside outside of such town if they reside within such county or an adjoining county.
LawCode: Amd ยง23, Town L; amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law and the public officers law, in relation to authorizing the building inspector in the town of Pendleton, county of Niagara, to reside outside such town
